subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|雔|又|t1=two birds|t2=hand|ls=ic}} – Represents two birds ({{zh-l|*隹}}) in someone's right hand ({{zh-l|*又}}).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=shuāng
|m-s=suang1
|c=soeng1,sung1
|c_note=sung1 - variant only for “a pair (of chopsticks)”
|c-t=song1
|g=song1
|h=pfs=sûng;gd=sung1
|j=suon1
|mb=só̤ng
|md=sĕ̤ng
|mn=xm,zz,tp,kh,tn,yl,tc:siang/qz,lk,sx,km,mg,hc:sang/song
|mn_note=siang/sang - vernacular; song - literary
|mn-t=sang1
|w=1saan
|x=xyan1
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=cls,a,pn
}}
